summary: Qualified analytical professional with strong talent for leveraging knowledge in statistics, machine learning, and econometrics to build and validate predictive models (PD, LGD, EAD) across the financial/banking industry with 6+ years of experience. Driver of continuous improvement, analysing existing processes and executing initiatives to optimise and automate processes. Proficient in the basics of IRB Basel and European regulation (CRR / CRD, EBA). Technically proficient in Python, SAS, SQL, and R.
